abstract.original_text: publicly funded repositories, such as the WHO COVID database with rights for unrestricted research re-use and analyses in any form or by any means with acknowledgement of the original source. These permissions are granted for free by Elsevier for as long as the COVID-19 resource centre remains active. C, Cats; D, dogs. * Only clinical signs/disease syndromes from animals with natural infection listed. Data compiled from references 26,35,44,66-71,75-77,83-86. † Seroreactivity reported in cats, but no confirmed cases of infection (see text).
